articles.title: Uber and Lyft Partner With Baidu (BIDU) to Launch Driverless Taxi Trials in the UK
articles.mainIdea: Uber and Lyft Partner With Baidu (BIDU) to Launch Driverless Taxi Trials in the UK
articles.summary: Insider Monkey: Uber and Lyft Partner With Baidu (BIDU) to Launch Driverless Taxi Trials in the UK. Baidu, Inc. (NASDAQ:BIDU) is one of the best rising tech stocks to buy now. A significant escalation in the global race toward autonomous mobility occurred on December 22, 2025, when Uber and Lyft announced partnerships with Baidu, Inc. (NASDAQ:BIDU) to launch driverless taxi trials in the UK in 2026. This partnership will see Baidu’s Apollo […] Related tickers mentioned: BAIDF, BIDU, GOOG, UBER.
